channel.description: Recent content in debugging on pwning.systems

item.title: Setting Up a Kernel Debugging Environment
item.description: Following up on my first blog post, I’ve received a few requests to write about setting up a debugging environment; however, since everybody uses different emulators and so on, I’ll mainly focus on which config options are useful! You must first obtain the kernel sources for your preferred version before you can set up a kernel suitable for debugging. We’ll have to decompress it after that. $ wget https://git.kernel.org/torvalds/t/linux-5.12-rc5.tar.gz # user your prefered version $ tar xvf linux-5.
